name: HellTrap
description:
"They said I had preternatural capabilities, and that they wanted to expand mankind's horizons. They told me my volitional assistance would benefit everyone on a global scale. They requested to my family to promote their operations, and in such incite me to wilfully authorize the "Blissful Organization to Nurture the Gents of Subsequence" proceed in testings on my being.."

HellTrap is a game made for fun and to learn by a bunch of people over the course of 4 days. It is a top down action game where you have to evade traps and projectiles to reach the end of the level. You can gain upgrades between levels if you picked up enough vials.

Controls are WASD or Arrows to move and Shift or Space bar to dash. When you finish a level, you get the upgrade screen. The 3 buttons mean: DsCh+ adds an extra charge of the dash, DsCd- reduces the time for the dash to recharge and ShCd- reduces the time the shield takes to recharge.

The game was made in Godot engine, the only thing that was not made by us in those four days is the tv effect shader which comes from here: https://godotshaders.com/shader/VHS-and-CRT-monitor-effect
